title: Blossom Cascade Diamond and Gemstone Earrings
materials: 34.740 grams) and adorned with 498 Brilliant Cut Diamonds (3.77 carats)

features: A modern take on the traditional Jhumka, these earrings feature a delicate floral cascade design. Brilliant-cut diamonds pave the stylized floral elements, while marquise and pan-cut gemstones are nestled along the stem, creating a vibrant colour palette. The setting style accentuates the sparkle of the diamonds and the unique hues of the colored gemstones. This unique style blends modern aesthetics with the classic Indian appreciation for floral motifs.
colors: Primarily white (diamonds) with accents of yellow
and blue from the colored gemstones. The gold provides a warm
occasions: or adding a touch of elegance to your everyday wear. Suitable for both traditional Indian attire and modern outfits. Can be worn during special celebrations.
description: These earrings are a unique blend of traditional inspiration and contemporary design, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship. The combination of dazzling diamonds and colorful gemstones creates a captivating and versatile piece. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The floral design symbolizes joy and prosperity, making it a meaningful gift.
